post.body: ate lobsters in Maine last wk. Excellent & cheapest in yrs @1.5lbs for $15
sitting downtown dinner at Socarrat Paella Bar NYC. Ordered fiduea & paella de marisco...we'll see how it is.
common cold symptoms usually last ~1wk
gutbusting trip to Golden Mall in flushing. Great eats, dirt cheap. Will post dispatch on foodgps
Egg (brooklyn) again for bkfst this morning, followed by Cafe Grumpy coffee. Country ham bisquit = great way to start a Sunday
